conversation1.speaker: human1
conversation1.text: Tumhara favorite street food kya hai?

conversation1.speaker: human2
conversation1.text: Bhai, mere liye samose aur chai combo hai ultimate. Ek samosa aur chai ka sip, lagta hai zindagi set hai. Tumhara?

conversation1.speaker: human1
conversation1.text: Haha, mujhe golgappe pasand hain. Ek baar start karo, toh stop button dhoondte reh jao! ğŸ˜†

conversation1.speaker: human2
conversation1.text: Golgappe toh ultimate addiction hain. Ek baar golgappa khaya toh muh se 'aur do' ke ilawa kuch nahi nikalta! Tumhe kabhi paanipuri ke pani se asar hua?

conversation1.speaker: human1

conversation1.speaker: human2
conversation1.text: Burger balance ka talent bhi hona chahiye. Tumhe roadside bhutta pasand hai?

conversation13.text: Yaar, mujhe gel-based cleansers pasand hain. Ekdum fresh aur clean feel hoti hai. ğŸ§¼

conversation13.speaker: human2
conversation13.text: Haan, lekin dry skin walon ke liye cream-based cleansers best hain. Moisture lock kar dete hain. ğŸ’§

conversation13.speaker: human1
conversation13.text: Bilkul! Aur oily skin ke liye foaming cleansers zabardast hain. Oil ko control mein rakhte hain. ğŸ§´

conversation13.speaker: human2
conversation13.text: Haan, par over-cleansing se bachna. Warna skin aur oil produce karegi. ğŸ˜…

conversation13.speaker: human1
conversation13.text: Right! Aur sensitive skin ke liye fragrance-free aur gentle cleansers best hain. ğŸŒ¿

conversation13.speaker: human2
conversation13.text: Bilkul! Har skin type ke liye alag cleanser hona chahiye. Ek size fits all nahi hota! ğŸ˜†

conversation13.speaker: human1
conversation13.text: Haan, aur double cleansing bhi try kar sakte hain. Pehle oil-based cleanser, phir water-based. âœ¨

conversation13.speaker: human2
conversation13.text: Wah! Ekdum professional skincare routine lag raha hai. ğŸ˜„

conversation13.speaker: human1
conversation13.text: Haan, aur sunscreen bhi zaroori hai. Clean face pe hi best kaam karta hai. â˜€ï¸

conversation13.speaker: human2
conversation13.text: Right! Aur har raat face wash zaroor karna. Warna pores block ho jayenge. ğŸ˜Š

conversation14.speaker: human1
conversation14.text: Sensitive skin ke liye sabse pehle toh gentle cleanser chahiye. Bilkul mild, jaise baby soap. ğŸ§¼

conversation14.speaker: human2
conversation14.text: Haan, aur alcohol-free toner bhi. Warna irritation ho jayegi. ğŸƒ

conversation14.speaker: human1
conversation14.text: Right! Aur fragrance-free moisturizer. Simple aur effective. ğŸ’§

conversation14.speaker: human2
conversation14.text: Haan, aur sunscreen bhi zaroori hai. Lekin physical sunscreen best hoti hai sensitive skin ke liye. â˜€ï¸

conversation14.speaker: human1
conversation14.text: Bilkul! Aur exfoliation bhi bohot gentle hona chahiye. Weekly ek baar se zyada nahi. ğŸ˜Š

conversation14.speaker: human2
conversation14.text: Haan, aur patch test zaroor karna. Warna skin ko naya product suit na kare toh problem ho sakti hai. ğŸ˜¬

conversation14.speaker: human1
conversation14.text: Aur chemical peels avoid karna. Sensitive skin pe reaction ho sakti hai. ğŸŒ¿

conversation14.speaker: human2
conversation14.text: Haan, aur hydrating serums use kar sakte hain. Skin ko calm rakhte hain. ğŸ’§

conversation14.speaker: human1
conversation14.text: Bilkul! Aur makeup products bhi specially sensitive skin ke liye lene chahiye. ğŸ˜Š

conversation14.speaker: human2
conversation14.text: Right! Aur overall, minimalistic approach rakhni chahiye. Less is more. ğŸŒŸ
